de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.statistics.distribution.estimator.meta

Class BestFitEstimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.statistics.distribution.estimator.meta.BestFitEstimator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistributionEstimator<Distribution>

    public class BestFitEstimator
extends Object
implements DistributionEstimator<Distribution>
    A meta estimator that will try a number of (inexpensive) estimations, then choose whichever works best.
    Since:
    0.6.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
